mapper.select: SELECT u.*,t.ticket_end FROM member m JOIN ht_users_data u ON m.users_id = u.users_id JOIN ticket_data t ON t.TICKET_ID = m.TICKET_ID WHERE m.trainer_id = #{trainer_id} AND #{selectDate} < t.TICKET_END
mapper.insert: insert into record_data(rcod_id, sdu_id, record_date, play_type, rcod_count, rcod_type, rcod_trcom) values (rcod_id_seq.nextval, #{SDU_ID}, #{selectDate},#{PLAY_TYPE}, #{RCOD_COUNT}, #{RCOD_TYPE}, #{RCOD_TRCOM})
